comment: Best teacher hands down! Take him if you can!

He's in the business so lectures are relevant.  No organization to the class or posted grades so be ready for that. Take GREAT notes. All tests are open notes and on point with what is covered in the lecture. If you dont do laid back  and you crave organization avoid this man. If you want to learn and can handle disorganization he is your guy!!!
Best teacher at KSU hands down. Coolest class I've ever taken.

THE BEST TEACHER!!!!!!! SUCCESSFUL IN REAL LIFE!!! He runs a multimillion dollar real estate business...so of course he is going to be a good teacher! IF YOU GET A CHANCE TO TAKE THIS CLASS....DO IT!!!! IF YOU DO, YOU WILL FOR SURE BE A SUCCESS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Prof Kushner is the best teacher at KSU!! He is a real estate professional and very succesful. He brings his real life experience to the class room. He is funny, witty and I have never learned so much from a teacher at KSU. If you want to be succesful in business, take Prof Kushner class!!!!
